scripts.backend: cd backend && (if [ -f ../.venv/bin/python ]; then ../.venv/bin/python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000; elif [ -f ../.venv/Scripts/python.exe ]; then ../.venv/Scripts/python.exe -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000; else python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000; fi)
